verses.text: And in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, ye shall have an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: it is a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w blowing|strong="H8643"\w* the trumpets unto you.

And ye shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* for a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \add and\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,
And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, throughout the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:
And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you:

Beside the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, according unto their \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*, for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And ye shall have on the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of this \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; and ye shall \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: ye shall not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* any \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein:\add*

But ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; they shall be unto you without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* to a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \add and\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,
A several tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, throughout the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* of \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w*, and the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of it, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* ye shall have an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, and ye shall \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; they shall be without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* unto \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* of the \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* to \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*,
And a several tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* to \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add ye shall offer\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* thereof, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*;

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

Their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ On the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall have a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*: ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein:\add*

But ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

Their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, for the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \add shall be\add* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

These \add things\add* ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in your set \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, beside your \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, and your freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*, for your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and for your meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and for your drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, and for your peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.\f + \fr 29.39 \ft do: or, offer\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
